name: Cygnet Commitee
description:
The year is 2049. Your mission is this: to take down a military cult that has formed around Joan of Arc.

The cult members have constructed an artificial intelligence based on the famous military maid executed for heresy hundreds of years ago.

You must infiltrate the AI's control room and disable its central processing unit.

A Twine game for IF Comp 2021.

All donations will go to Itch.io.
